scripts.dev: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n SVR,STK,WEB -c green,magenta,cyan "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:stok" "npm run dev:web"

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../stok && npm install && cd ../web && npm install
